abstract.t: This document provides the Management Information Base (MIB) for the Next Hop Routing Protocol (NHRP). The NHRP protocol is a protocol for allowing IP source stations on a switched Non Broadcast Multiple Access (NBMA) network such as ATM or X.25 to determine the NBMA switched circuit (i.e. 'physical') address of other stations attached to the same NBMA network. Protocols such as ARP provide this function only for IP destinations in the same Logical IP Subnet (LIS) as the source. NHRP permits this resolution for destinations on a different LIS. NHRP is described in [NHRP].
